test-case.name: K2-BaseURIProlog-4
test-case.description: The static base-uri must be absolute. Since the declaration supplies a relative URI, an implementation may fail with computing an absolute URI, hence XPST0001 is allowed. The test checks that the static base-uri is absolute.
test-case.test: declare base-uri "abc"; declare function local:isAbsolute($uri as xs:string?) as xs:boolean { fn:matches($uri, "[a-zA-Z0-9\-.]*:/") }; local:isAbsolute(fn:static-base-uri())
